title: Either continuesto develop the project as approved under the erstwhile regulations in toto; and for that limited purpose erstwhile regulation shall remain in force
clause_text: Either continuesto develop the project as approved under the erstwhile regulations in toto; and for that limited purpose erstwhile regulation shall remain in force.
